sourcesContent:
import {
    Button,
    Flex,
    Heading,
    Stack,
    Text,
    Image,
    InputLeftElement,
    FormControl,
    InputGroup,
    Icon,
    Grid,
    Box,
    GridItem,
    FormLabel,
    Input
} from "@chakra-ui/react";
import { Checkbox, CheckboxGroup } from "@chakra-ui/react";
import { useState } from "react";

import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom";


import { FaLinkedin } from "react-icons/all";
import {
    BrowserRouter as Router,
    Switch,
    Route,
    Link
  } from "react-router-dom";
import { FaSignInAlt } from "react-icons/fa/index";
import { Progress } from "@chakra-ui/react"
import {setState} from 'react';



function GetStarted() {
    const history = useHistory();
    const [value, setValue] = useState(20);
    const [step, setStep] = useState(1);
    const [text, setText] = useState("Your focus")
    
    const next = () => {
        setValue(value + 20);
        setStep(step + 1)
        console.log(step);
        if(step == 1) {
            
            setText("Your child")
        } else if (step === 2 ){
            
            setText("Their capablities")
        } else if ( step === 3 ) {
            setText("Create account")

        } else if(step === 4){
            setText("All done");
            
        } else if(step === 5){
            console.log("It should be here")
            history.push("/home")
        }
    }

    return (
        
        <>
        
        <Flex px={3}  py={4} justify="center" minH="100vh" w="100%" overflowX="hidden">
            <Stack p={0}  borderRadius="lg" >
            <Stack pb={4} px={5}>
                <Text fontWeight="700">{step}/5 {text}</Text>
                <Progress colorScheme="green" size="xs" value={value} />    
            </Stack>    
            {
                step === 1 &&
                <Stack textAlign="center" spacing="5">
                    
                    <Text fontSize="16pt" fontWeight="700" textColor="gray.600">
                    What would you like to get from your Brand/T@4 experience
                    </Text>

                    <Text  fontWeight="700" mb="54px" textColor="#979797">
                    Choose as many as you like from below
                    </Text>
                
                    <Box border="2px" borderRadius="8px" borderColor="#979797" onClick={next} _hover={{bg:"primary"}} cursor="pointer">
                        <Stack textAlign="center" p={2} spacing={1}>
                            <Text fontSize="16px" fontWeight="500" textColor="#979797">
                            Newtworking with people from similar professions
                            </Text>

                            
                    
                        </Stack>
                    </Box>

                    <Box border="2px" borderRadius="8px" borderColor="#979797" onClick={next} _hover={{bg:"primary"}} cursor="pointer">
                        <Stack textAlign="center" p={2} spacing={1}>
                            <Text fontSize="16px" fontWeight="500" textColor="#979797">
                            Newtworking with people from similar industry sectors
                            </Text>

                            
                    
                        </Stack>
                    </Box>

                    <Box border="2px" borderRadius="8px" borderColor="#979797" onClick={next} _hover={{bg:"primary"}} cursor="pointer">
                        <Stack textAlign="center" p={2} spacing={1}>
                            <Text fontSize="16px" fontWeight="500" textColor="#979797">
                            Newtworking with people who share similar interests
                            </Text>

                            
                    
                        </Stack>
                    </Box>

                    <Box border="2px" mb="77px" borderRadius="8px" borderColor="#979797" onClick={next} _hover={{bg:"primary"}} cursor="pointer">
                        <Stack textAlign="center" p={2} spacing={1}>
                            <Text fontSize="16px" fontWeight="500" textColor="#979797">
                            Networking with people from different professions, and sectors
                            </Text>

                            
                    
                        </Stack>
                    </Box>

                    

                    <Button textColor="black" 
                        variant="outline" 
                        shadow="lg"  
                        size="lg"
                        borderRadius="30px"
                        bg="psrimary"
                        alignSelf="center"
                        w="100%"
                        border="2px"
                        _hover={{bg:"secondary"}}
                        onClick={next}
                        >
                        Continue
                    </Button>
                    <Flex w="100%" justify="center"><Box w="137px" mt="40px"  height="5px" bg="black" borderRadius="100px"></Box></Flex>
                </Stack>
            }


            {
                step === 2 &&
                <Stack textAlign="center" spacing="5">
                    
                <Text fontSize="16pt" fontWeight="700" textColor="gray.500">
                    Tell us about your lil' nipper
                </Text>

                <Stack spacing="0" align="center">
                    <Image
                        boxSize="130px"
                        objectFit="cover"
                        bg="gray.300"
                        borderRadius="70px"
                    />
                        <Button size="sm" 
                        color="white" bg="gray.600" w="20vw" textAlign="center" align="baseline"><Text fontSize="8pt">Add photo</Text></Button>

                </Stack>

            



                <Box border="1px" borderRadius="10px" borderColor="gray.300" >
                    <Stack textAlign="center" p={2} spacing={3}>
                        <Text textTransform="uppercase" fontSize="10pt" fontWeight="700" textColor="GrayText">
                            Child Name
                        </Text>

                        
                        <FormControl id="childName" my={4}>
                            <Input
                                type="text"
                                borderWidth="1px"
                                borderColor={'gray.500'}
                                borderRadius="14px"
                                placeholder="Name"
                                isRequired

                            />
                        </FormControl>

                
                    </Stack>
                </Box>


                <Box border="1px" borderRadius="10px" borderColor="gray.300" >
                    <Stack textAlign="center" p={2} spacing={3}>
                        <Text textTransform="uppercase" fontSize="10pt" fontWeight="700" textColor="GrayText">
                            Child date of birth
                        </Text>

                        
                        <FormControl id="childName" my={4}>
                            <Input
                                type="date"
                                borderWidth="1px"
                                borderColor={'gray.500'}
                                borderRadius="14px"
                                placeholder="Name"
                                isRequired

                            />
                        </FormControl>

                
                    </Stack>
                </Box>

                <Button textColor="black" 
                        variant="outline" 
                        shadow="lg"  
                        size="lg"
                        borderRadius="30px"
                        bg="psrimary"
                        alignSelf="center"
                        w="65vw"
                        border="2px"
                        _hover={{bg:"secondary"}}
                        onClick={next}
                        >
                        Continue
                    </Button>



            </Stack>

            }


            {
                step === 3 &&
                <Stack textAlign="center" spacing="2">
                    <Stack spacing={0}>
                        <Text fontSize="16pt" fontWeight="700" textColor="gray.600">
                            What are your child's abilities?
                        </Text>

                        <Text  fontWeight="700" textColor="GrayText" pt={2}>
                            Child's Nam can...
                        </Text>
                        <Text  fontWeight="700" textColor="GrayText">
                            (Pick as many as you like)
                        </Text>
                        
                    </Stack>
                    <Stack spacing={0} >
                    <Stack isInline spacing="7">
                        <Box
                        boxSize="150px"
                        objectFit="cover"
                        bg="primary"
                        color="gray.600"
                        borderRadius="90px"
                        >
                            <Text fontWeight="700" px={5} py={12}>
                            Play with other children

                                </Text>
                        </Box>


                        <Box
                        boxSize="150px"
                        objectFit="cover"
                        bg="theme"
                        color="gray.600"
                        borderRadius="90px"
                        >
                            <Text fontWeight="700" px={2} py={12}>
                            Can understand time of the day

                                </Text>
                        </Box>


                    </Stack>

                    <Box
                        boxSize="150px"
                        objectFit="cover"
                        bg="primary"
                        alignSelf="center"
                        color="gray.600"
                        borderRadius="90px"
                        >
                            <Text fontWeight="700" px={5} py={12}>
                            Shows a food preference

                                </Text>
                        </Box>

                        <Stack isInline spacing="7">
                        <Box
                        boxSize="150px"
                        objectFit="cover"
                        bg="theme"
                        color="gray.600"
                        borderRadius="90px"
                        >
                            <Text fontWeight="700" px={5} py={12}>
                            Plays independently

                                </Text>
                        </Box>


                        <Box
                        boxSize="150px"
                        objectFit="cover"
                        bg="primary"
                        color="gray.600"
                        borderRadius="90px"
                        >
                            <Text fontWeight="700" px={5} py={12}>
                            Play with other adults

                                </Text>
                        </Box>




                    </Stack>
                    <Box
                        boxSize="150px"
                        objectFit="cover"
                        bg="theme"
                        alignSelf="center"
                        color="gray.600"
                        borderRadius="90px"
                        >
                            <Text fontWeight="700" px={3} py={12}>
                            Understanding ownership

                                </Text>
                        </Box>

                        
                    </Stack>
                    <Button textColor="black" 
                        variant="outline" 
                        shadow="lg"  
                        size="lg"
                        borderRadius="30px"
                        bg="primary"
                        alignSelf="center"
                        w="65vw"
                        border="2px"
                        _hover={{bg:"secondary"}}
                        onClick={next}
                        >
                        Continue
                    </Button>




                </Stack>
            }


            {
                step === 4 &&
                <Stack textAlign="center" spacing="7">
                <Stack spacing="2" pt={3} pb={7}>

                <Text fontSize="18pt" fontWeight="700" textColor="gray.500">
                    Create Your Account
                </Text>
                
                <Text  fontWeight="700" textColor="GrayText">
                    Tell us about yourself
                </Text>
                </Stack>
            



                        
                        <FormControl id="email" my={4} px={4}>
                            <Input
                                type="text"
                                borderWidth="1px"
                                borderColor={'gray.500'}
                                borderRadius="14px"
                                placeholder="Email"
                                isRequired

                            />
                        </FormControl>

                
                

                        <FormControl id="password" my={4} px={4}>
                            <Input
                                type="password"
                                borderWidth="1px"
                                borderColor={'gray.500'}
                                borderRadius="14px"
                                placeholder="Password"
                                isRequired

                            />
                        </FormControl>

                        <Text fontSize="10pt" px={2} color="gray.300">
                            By continuing you are agreeing to Nest'd  
                            <Text as="span" fontWeight="700" color="gray.600"> terms and conditions </Text>
                            and <Text as="span" fontWeight="700" color="GrayText">privacy policy</Text>
                        </Text>

                
                <Button textColor="black" 
                        variant="outline" 
                        shadow="lg"  
                        size="lg"
                        borderRadius="30px"
                        bg="white"
                        alignSelf="center"
                        w="65vw"
                        border="2px"
                        _hover={{bg:"secondary"}}
                        onClick={next}
                        >
                        Create account
                    </Button>

                    
                    <Text fontSize="10pt" px={2} color="GrayText">
                        OR    
                    </Text>


                    <Button textColor="black" 
                        variant="outline" 
                        shadow="lg"  
                        size="lg"
                        borderRadius="30px"
                        bg="white"
                        alignSelf="center"
                        w="65vw"
                        border="2px"
                        _hover={{bg:"secondary"}}
                        onClick={next}
                        >
                        Sign in with Apple
                    </Button>


                    <Button textColor="black" 
                        variant="outline" 
                        shadow="lg"  
                        size="lg"
                        borderRadius="30px"
                        bg="white"
                        alignSelf="center"
                        w="65vw"
                        border="2px"
                        _hover={{bg:"secondary"}}
                        onClick={next}
                        >
                        Sign in with Facebook
                    </Button>




            </Stack>


            }

            
            {
                step === 5 &&
                <Stack textAlign="center" spacing="205">
                    
                <Stack spacing="0" align="center">
                    <Image
                        boxSize="200px"
                        objectFit="cover"
                        bg="gray.300"
                        border="2px"
                        borderColor="gray.400"
                        borderRadius="100px"
                    />

                </Stack>

            

                <Stack p={5}>


                    <Text fontSize="16pt" fontWeight="700" textColor="gray.600">
                        Great! We'll start generating activites for you and (Name)
                    </Text>

                    <Text  fontWeight="700" textColor="GrayText" px={50}>  
                        Be patient, we got you covered
                    </Text>

                    <Button textColor="black" 
                        variant="outline" 
                        shadow="lg"  
                        size="lg"
                        borderRadius="30px"
                        bg="primary"
                        mt={9}
                        alignSelf="center"
                        w="65vw"
                        border="2px"
                        _hover={{bg:"secondary"}}
                        onClick={next}
                        >
                        Continue
                    </Button>


                </Stack>




            </Stack>


            }

                {/* <Button textColor="black" 
                        variant="outline" 
                        shadow="lg"  
                        size="lg"
                        borderRadius="30px"
                        bg="primary"
                        alignSelf="center"
                        w="65vw"
                        border="2px"
                        // onClick={signup}
                        onClick={() => {
                            setValue(value + 20);
                            setStep(step + 1)
                        }}
                        _hover={{bg:"secondary"}}
                        >
                        Continue
                    </Button> */}

            </Stack>
            

        </Flex>
        
        </>

    )
}

export default GetStarted;
